name: Tailscale
variables: cmd:while true; do echo ok; sleep 1; done
cmds: docker run -d --name ${name} --hostname docker-${name} -e TS_AUTHKEY=${TS_AUTHKEY} --privileged --device /dev/net/tun -v ${name}-tailscale:/var/lib/tailscale ${extra_params} debian:13 bash -c "apt-get update -y; apt-get install -y curl tmux; curl -fsSL https://tailscale.com/install.sh | sh; tmux new -d -s tailscale tailscaled; sleep 2; tailscale up --authkey '${TS_AUTHKEY}'; tmux new -d -s cmd '${cmd}'; tail -f /dev/null;"
